citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on
12/16/2015.
Called the licensees cell phone and left a message. Waited 30 minutes to see if I received a reply to the message.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on
12/16/2015.
Called the licensees cell phone and left a message.  Waited 30 minutes to see if I received a reply to the message.
